name: CAROTE 14pcs Pots and Pans Set, Stainless Steel Cookware Set Detachable Handle, Induction Kitchen Cookware Sets with Removable Handle, RV Cookware Set, Oven Safe, Camping Cookware, White
short_description: Tri-ply fully-clad construction with aluminum core ensures fast, even heating, eliminating hot spots and providing consistent heat distribution from base to sides. Sturdy detachable handles allow easy stacking and storage, saving up to 70% of cabinet space, and transition seamlessly from stovetop to oven, table, or fridge. Ceramic-coated exterior for shiny, with a finely sanded interior three times smoother than regular stainless steel, ensuring perfect food browning and a non-stick, easy-to-clean experience. Made from high-quality 18/8 stainless steel, oven-safe up to 600°F, with flared, cast edges for drip-free pouring, keeping your countertops clean. Compatible with all stovetops. Carote provides 12 months warranty from the date of purchase. Please don't hesitate to reach out if any quality problem. You will be guaranteed to get satisfying solution.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set, 14-Piece Pots and Pans Set, Kitchen Cooking Pan Set with Stay-Cool Handle, Non Toxic, Dishwasher Safe, Compatible with All Stovetops - Gas, Electric, Induction
short_description: 【Stainless Steel Pots and Pans Set】14 Pieces Induction Cookware Sets included 2.2qt saucepan with lid, 3.8qt stockpot with steamer ＆ lid, 8inch frying pan, 9.5inch fry pan with lid, 4 pot protectors and 2 kitchen utensils. After cleaning, it is recommended to wipe dry with a soft towel and place the pot in a dry and ventilated place.

name: Mueller Pots and Pans Set 17-Piece, Ultra-Clad Pro Stainless Steel Cookware Set, Ergonomic EverCool Handle, Induction Cookware, Includes Saucepans, Skillets, Dutch Oven, Stockpot, Steamer For Cooking
short_description: Contemporary Essentials - This contemporary 17 Piece kitchen cookware set ensures you have everything you need to create inspiring meals every day! With a brushed satin stainless steel design and sleek ergonomic handles, the practical cookware will suit any kitchen décor while providing professional cooking performance for every meal, large or small. Strong And Durable -The pots and pans feature a 3-ply premium quality stainless steel base with a thick aluminum core for fast and even heat distribution and maximum durability. The non-toxic stainless steel cookware will not discolor, react with food, or alter flavors, keeping your meals safe and healthy. The even heating reduces hot spots that can easily burn foods and cooks foods faster to save you both time and energy! Versatility - This cookware set is a complete kitchen in a box! Simmer, sauté, fry, boil or braise to your heart's content! Includes 1, 2 and 3qt saucepans, 8”, 10” and 12” skillets, large 3.5qt sauté pan, 4.5qt Dutch oven, versatile 8qt stock pot as well as a multi-tiered steamer insert that fits all saucepans and interchangeable lids. Each pan is suitable for oven and stovetop cooking, including induction. Seal In Flavors - Utilize the professional-grade tempered glass lids to help retain heat and seal in moisture and nutrients for healthier, more flavorful meals. The covers with steam vents fit perfectly within the smoothly tapered rims, designed to eliminate drips and spills while pouring. Double riveted comfort grip handles provide extra strength and stay cooler for longer to help maneuver on the stove top. Superior Quality With Mueller - We are here to offer you only the best quality products designed to make your life easier. If you need any help, please feel free to contact us. Our unparalleled 24/7 live telephone customer support is ready and waiting to assist with anything you need!

name: GreenPan x Bobby Flay 10 Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set, Tri-Ply Multiclad Pots & Pans, Professional Grade, Oven & Broiler Safe to 600°F, Dishwasher Safe, Durable, Induction Compatible, Silver
short_description: COMPLETE 10-PIECE SET: Includes 8" Frypan, 10" Frypan, 4QT Sauté Pan with Lid, 1.6QT Chef’s Pan with Lid, 2.5QT Chef’s Pan with Lid, and 8QT Stockpot with Lid. PROFESSIONAL GRADE 3-PLY STAINLESS STEEL: Three layers of stainless steel construction deliver fast, even heating, excellent searing, and long-lasting durability. VERSATILE PERFORMANCE: Ideal for all stovetops—including gas, electric, and induction—and oven safe up to 600˚F for professional-grade cooking in any kitchen. DISHWASHER SAFE & EASY TO CLEAN: Spend less time scrubbing—this cookware is dishwasher safe for effortless cleanup. ERGONOMIC HANDLES: Ultra-durable stainless steel handles are riveted for strength and designed for a secure, comfortable grip. COOK AND LOOK GLASS LIDS: Tempered glass lids lock in moisture while letting you monitor your cooking without lifting the lid. CHIP-RESISTANT RIMS: Thoughtfully crafted with enclosed chip-free rims to enhance strength and prevent cracking or flaking.
product_description: World-renowned chef, TV host, restaurateur, and author Bobby Flay partnered with GreenPan to bring years of expertise and cooking innovation to this cutting-edge collection. Packed with thoughtful details that make cooking at home easier, these pans are crafted from professional grade tri-ply stainless steel and feature a powerful aluminum core for incredible durability, faster heating, and no hot spots. The ergonomic, stainless steel handles keep you comfortable and in command while the chip-free edges help prevent damage for years of use. Plus, the tempered glass lids give you an easy view of your meal without releasing heat. Designed to deliver in any kitchen, this set is optimized for performance on all stovetops, including induction, oven safe up to 400˚F, and dishwasher safe for effortless cleanup.

name: Tramontina Tempo Tri-Ply Base Stainless Steel 7-Piece Cookware Set with Glass Lids, Pots and Pans Kitchen Set, Induction-Ready, Oven-Safe, Dishwasher-Safe
short_description: 7-Piece Set Includes: a 10-in Frying Pan, 2 Sauce Pans with lids (2 and 3-qt), and a 5-qt Dutch Oven with lid. Tri-Ply Base for Even Heating: Features an impact-bonded aluminum core for fast, consistent heat distribution, eliminating hot spots for precise cooking. Durable 18/8 Stainless Steel Construction: NSF-certified for safety and quality, this non-reactive, rust-resistant cookware is built to last. Featuring a mirror-polished exterior and satin-finished interior for a sleek, professional look, it comes backed by a lifetime warranty for your peace of mind. Transparent Glass Lid & Comfortable Grip Handles: The clear glass lid locks in moisture and flavor while allowing you to monitor cooking progress easily. The securely riveted, ergonomic stainless steel handles provide a comfortable, firm grip for safe and confident handling. Induction-Ready, Oven-Safe & Dishwasher-Safe: Compatible with all cooktops, including induction, oven-safe up to 400°F, and dishwasher-safe for effortless cleanup.
product_description: For home cooks who love to entertain, experiment, and cook with confidence, the Tramontina Tempo 7-Piece Cookware Set is designed to keep up with you. Whether you’re prepping a weeknight dinner, hosting a dinner party, or making a meal to share, this set gives you versatile, high-performance cookware that’s built to handle it all. Designed with tri-ply base construction, each piece features an impact-bonded aluminum core that heats quickly and evenly, eliminating hot spots so every dish is cooked to perfection. The 18/8 stainless steel cooking surface is non-reactive, keeping flavors pure and allowing for effortless cooking. With a sleek mirror-polished exterior, this set isn’t just functional—it’s designed to impress. Built for both intimate meals and entertaining, each vessel is thoughtfully sized to serve individuals, families, or a table full of guests. The ergonomic, riveted stainless steel handles provide a secure grip, ensuring easy movement from stovetop to oven—because this set is oven-safe up to 400°F. And when the cooking’s done? It’s dishwasher-safe for an effortless cleanup. For the home cook who does it all—this is your go-to set for everyday meals and special occasions alike. Set the pace. Own the kitchen.
